description: Namelix uses generative AI to create a short, brandable business name. Search for domain availability, and instantly generate a logo for your new business
title: Business Name Generator - free AI-powered naming tool - Namelix
introduction: Namelix is a business name generator that uses artificial intelligence to create short and brandable names for new businesses. It offers unique and catchy name suggestions based on a state-of-the-art language model.
features: Filter results based on preferences like name length, specific keywords, or domain extension
Save preferred names for better recommendations over time

faqs.question: Why choose a branded name?
faqs.answer: Branded names are unique, memorable, and affordable, making them a popular choice for startups in 2024.
